scripts.watch: npm run html && npm run js-watch && npm run css-watch
scripts.watch-dist: npm run html && npm run js-watch-dist && npm run css-watch
scripts.build: npm run html && npm run js-build && npm run css
scripts.build-dist: npm run html && npm run js-build-dist && npm run css-dist
scripts.js-build-dist: browserify -v -t babelify -t uglifyify src/js/App.js | npm run js-min
scripts.js-watch: screen -dmS js-watch watchify -v -d -t babelify src/js/App.js -o dist/js/app.js
scripts.js-watch-dist: screen -dmS js-watch-dist watchify -v -t babelify -t uglifyify src/js/App.js -o 'npm run js-min'
scripts.css-pre: postcss --use postcss-import --use autoprefixer src/css/styles.css | cssnano > src/css/_styles.css
scripts.css-watch: screen -dmS css-watch postcss --watch --use postcss-import --use autoprefixer src/css/styles.css -o dist/css/styles.css
scripts.css: npm run css-pre && npm run css-pure
scripts.css-dist: npm run css-pre && npm run css-pure-dist
